channel.title: Items not appearing after somebody dies
channel.description:
when somebody dies the items only appear to the person, not the person that killed them if they are in the wilderness, and they dont appear after so long after they have died to an npc, only the firecape and barrows gloves appear to the pker, can anybody help please?
Edit and when you drop something it disappears :/
